items.name: init(rawValue: String)
items.desc: Creates a new instance with the raw value you specify.

items.name: static let ambient: AVAudioSession.Category
items.desc: The category for an app in which sound playback is nonprimary â€” that is, your app also works with the sound turned off.

items.name: static let multiRoute: AVAudioSession.Category
items.desc: The category for routing distinct streams of audio data to different output devices at the same time.

items.name: static let playAndRecord: AVAudioSession.Category
items.desc: The category for recording (input) and playback (output) of audio, such as for a Voice over Internet Protocol (VoIP) app.

items.name: static let playback: AVAudioSession.Category
items.desc: The category for playing recorded music or other sounds that are central to the successful use of your app.

items.name: static let record: AVAudioSession.Category
items.desc: The category for recording audio while also silencing playback audio.
